name: ChipsView
description: A filter chip component with multiple states (Default, Active, Avatar) and sizes (32pt, 40pt). Used for filters, tags, and user selections.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text displayed in the chip

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Optional icon displayed on the left side (not used in avatar state)

properties.name: state
properties.description: Visual state: .default (gray bg), .active (green bg), or .avatar (with user info)

properties.name: avatarImage
properties.description: User avatar image (only for avatar state)

properties.name: onClose
properties.description: Callback when close button is tapped (only for avatar state)
